item.description:
The refuge is renowned for its wildlife observation and photography opporntunities. Observation towers and platforms afford commanding views of the refuge and surrounding lands and waters. Several miles of self-guiding foot trails meander through dune, maritime forest, and marsh habitats. All trails are on boardwalks or lined with stonedust to protect the refuge's fragile ecosystems.

 

There is a $5.00 fee per car.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at refuge entrance on Sunset Drive /Please note different from above.
item.name: Winter Wildlife/landscape Shoot
